title: Take a look at our LOW monthly payment! LESS than your rent!
posting_body: One of our most popular homes is a 4-bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home with 2,378 sq ft.
floor plan also features over $10,000 worth of upgrades - including a full set of energy efficient Whirlpool kitchen appliances!
The chef-inspired kitchen also comes complete with custom cabinetry and gorgeous quartz counter-tops.
The attached 2-car garage and over-sized driveway is perfect for a family with multiple cars, or just to have that extra bit of space you've been needing!
There are NO application fees and NO security deposits.
Plus, all pets are welcome at no additional cost!
This is your chance to own a home for LE$$ than what you're paying in rent...
Don't miss out, call today to schedule a tour -
*P & I. Price $579,900, 5.5% Fixed/5.533% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance, and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
